page.title: 01ABOUT HARWORTH AND BIRCOTES
page.content: Our block consists of the villages of HARWORTH AND BIRCOTES which are comb ined and the small village of STYRRUP about a mile away.HARWORTH is an old village hundreds of years old whilst BIRCOTES has grown up around the pit in this century. AMMENITIES.A sports centre,a youth centre,library,a miner's welfare hall and institute. EDUCATION.Four primary schools : infant,junior,Church of England Primary and Catholic Primary.One Comprehensive school . EMPLOYMENT.The colliery is the main employer.There is also some light industry. SHOPS.The main shopping street is Scrooby Road where most goods can be bought.For large items and clothes people often go to Doncaster or perhaps Worksop.
